title: RHOSLC Hot Mic + And Just Like That Ep. 9 Recap!
itunes:title: RHOSLC Hot Mic + And Just Like That Ep. 9 Recap!
description:
But what a time to be alive! Danny recaps this week's The Real Housewives of Salt Lake City, which featured the women still in Zion in utter chaos. Meredith storms out of a Cinco de Mayo dinner, while Lisa gets caught in a hot mic moment that was truly shocking. PS I LOVE TACO BELL! #Justice4TBell


After RHOSLC, Danny dives into the penultimate episode of And Just Like That to discuss the Cleveland of it all, Miranda appropriating Meg Ryan, Steve's Dorinda impression, and more! Plus, VPR, Beethoven, and Cher singing The Golden Girls!


And Just Like That Recap: 46:00ish


LINKS:
